recipesJson.name: Coop's Kiwi "Cheesecake"
recipesJson.author: ID10-T
recipesJson.description: Not my original recipe; I'm sharing this with the blessing of its creator, /u/Coop34 of Reddit, because it needs to be in ATF's search results when someone looks for recipes using FA Kiwi. Although the recipe is not mine, the quotation marks in the title were added by me, because it doesn't really taste like a cheesecake to me. It tastes more like a most delicious graham cereal topped with kiwi. Don't be afraid of the high % of FA Meringue here; it does a lovely sort of dance with the tartness of the kiwi. Coop says only an overnight steep is required, but I liked it even more after three days.

reviews.text: This kiwi "cheesecake" is incredible. Easily a 5-star recipe for me. I tasted this as a SNV and then again after 3 days, and although it really is great off the shake, Id10-t was right in saying that it is even better after a few days steep. For only 9% total flavoring, the flavor you get from this is insane.  FA Kiwi is a fantastic flavor and the FA Meringue balances it out very well. There is not really anything to compare it to since it really is not a cheesecake. The closest thing I can think of is a kiwi parfait without the yogurt.
Surprisingly accurate for how simple it is. The kiwi really pops and the cheesecake note is actually pretty creamy. Everything works so well together in this recipe.
Do yourself a favor and mix this one. Buy the FA Kiwi if you need it, it's worth it and no substitution will do it justice. Just do it, you'll thank me later.
Simple, tasty and well balanced indeed.

This is great plus to be only 3 flavors and little to no steep time makes this an easy ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è  The meringue &cheese cake graham crust work very well together and then the delicious FA ü•ù just tops it off
Really good simple 3 flavoured recipe. Wish I‚Äôd found this when I first started out mixing. Well balanced, nice and smooth with a slight tartness.
Awesome! Love how simple but really good this recipe is.
I love this recipe! How simple, yet complex it is. Coop34 was always one of my favorite mixers. Still to this day his Raspberry Custard is in my top 3 favorite juices. Thanks for sharing Dave!
Love this simple blend. Its very unique and the flavors just work together. Recommend to anyone looking for something different and very tasty.
The meringue and cheesecake overpower way to hard; to the point that it tastes like your vaping warm kiwi cheese for me.
This is a great simple recipe, 3 flavours mixed to make a well balanced kiwi juice. As ID10-T says it's not your regular cheesecake but highly recommended.
Perfectly balanced recipe, that meringue sits so perfect there together with the kiwi and cheesecake. Simply delicious.
